Package interactr.cs.kuleuven.be.ui

Class DiagramNotificationCenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • interactr.cs.kuleuven.be.ui.DiagramNotificationCenter

  • public class DiagramNotificationCenter
extends java.lang.Object
    A class of notification centers for notifying registered observers of changes to a diagram. Currently this notification center (an event bus - pattern = singleton/mediator/observer) only knows of diagram observers. It could be written to notify subwindows and diagram views of specific notifications tailored to their needs, but it would be less extensible that way.

      • defaultCenter

        public static DiagramNotificationCenter defaultCenter​()
        Get the default notification center for diagrams. This is a singleton.

      • diagramDidAddParty

        public void diagramDidAddParty​(Diagram diagram,
                               Party party,
                               Point coordinates)
        Notify observers that the given party was added to the given diagram.
        Parameters:
        diagram - The diagram to which the party was added.
        party - The party that was added.
        coordinates - The coordinates at which the party was added.

      • diagramDidReplaceParty

        public void diagramDidReplaceParty​(Diagram diagram,
                                   Party party,
                                   Party newParty)
        Notify observers that the given party was replaced in the given diagram.
        Parameters:
        diagram - The diagram to which the party was added.
        party - The party that was replaced.
        newParty - The replacement of the party.

      • diagramDidAddMessages

        public void diagramDidAddMessages​(Diagram diagram,
                                  InvocationMessage invocationMessage,
                                  ResultMessage resultMessage,
                                  Point startCoordinates,
                                  Point endCoordinates)
        Notify observers that the given messages were added to the given diagram.
        Parameters:
        diagram - The diagram to which the party was added.
        invocationMessage - The invocation message that was added.
        resultMessage - The result message that was added.
        startCoordinates - The start coordinates for the invocation message.
        endCoordinates - The end coordinates for the invocation message.

                                      DiagramComponent component)
        Notify observers that the given component was removed from the given diagram.
        Parameters:
        diagram - The diagram from which the component was removed.
        component - The component that was deleted.

      • diagramDidEditLabel

        public void diagramDidEditLabel​(Diagram diagram,
                                DiagramComponent component)
        Notify observers that the label of the component belonging to the given diagram was edited.
        Parameters:
        diagram - The diagram to which the component belongs.
        component - The component whose label was edited.

      • registerDiagramView

        public void registerDiagramView​(Diagram diagram,
                                DiagramView diagramView)
        Register the given diagram view as an observer. This associates the observer with the given diagram so that it can be notified of any changes to that diagram.
        Parameters:
        diagram - The diagram to register the observer with.
        diagramView - The diagram view that is to be registered.

      • registerSubWindow

        public void registerSubWindow​(Diagram diagram,
                              SubWindow subWindow)
        Register the given subwindow as an observer. This associates the observer with the given diagram so that it can be notified of any changes to that diagram.
        Parameters:
        diagram - The diagram to register the observer with.
        subWindow - The subwindow that is to be registered.

      • unregisterSubWindow

        public void unregisterSubWindow​(Diagram diagram,
                                SubWindow subWindow)
        Remove the given subwindow as an observer. If the observer was previously associated with the given diagram, than it is unregistered as an observer (i.e. it won't receive any updates anymore).
        Parameters:
        diagram - The diagram to register the observer with.
        subWindow - The subwindow that is to be removed as an observer.

      • unregisterDiagramView

        public void unregisterDiagramView​(Diagram diagram,
                                  DiagramView diagramView)
        Remove the given diagram view as an observer. If the observer was previously associated with the given diagram, than it is unregistered as an observer (i.e. it won't receive any updates anymore).
        Parameters:
        diagram - The diagram to register the observer with.
        diagramView - The diagram view that is to be removed as an observer.
